name: Stygian Onslaught
desc:
Stygian Onslaught is a permanent combat event with challenges regularly updated 8 days after each version update and runs for 5 weeks per phase. It is unlocked at Adventure Rank 20.

A strange Ley Line Disturbance has once again appeared, this time in Liyue's Sal Terrae. You must breach the depths of this unpredictable Domain, for only by defeating powerful foes can the turmoil be quelled... Of course, where danger awaits, so too do extraordinary treasures...

customize.text: Notices
Permanent Combat Event "Stygian Onslaught": Defeat Powerful Foes and Uncover Hidden Treasures!

<color=#ffd780>June 18, 2025</color>
Greetings Traveler! Version 5.7 introduces the new permanent combat event "Stygian Onslaught."
Stygian Onslaught Event: Disturbance-affected Ley Line challenges
<color=#ffd780>June 23, 2025</color>
Permanent Combat Event "Stygian Onslaught" Is Now Available! Here Are Some Tips for You~

<color=#ffd780>June 25, 2025</color>
Greetings, Traveler! The new permanent combat event "Stygian Onslaught" is now available. In the event details released previously, we've introduced the basic rules, obtainable rewards, and event schedule.
We've compiled a few tips here based on your experience and feedback during the test period. Let's check it out together~

In the 10 days after Stygian Onslaught challenge is available, the Ley Line Disturbance will be in an "Outbreak" state.
When players with Adventure Rank 45 and above, challenge stages at "Hard" difficulty onwards, they can consume resin to revitalize special disturbance-affected Ley Line Blossoms and obtain rewards from their chosen Domain of Blessing.
When they consume resin in aforementioned method, they can accumulate Dire Prestige. When players accumulate 120 Dire Prestige and 1,200 Dire Prestige, they can obtain a Phase Reward and Dire Commendation respectively. The Phase Reward can be obtained multiple times during the event.

<color=#ffffff>Resin Type</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reward Multiplier</color>
<color=#ffffff>Dire Prestige Points</color>

customize.name: Original Resin
customize.desc: It is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

customize.name: Condensed Resin
customize.desc:
You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
Crystal filled with immense energy.
The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

customize.name: Fragile Resin
customize.desc:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.

This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin. The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in the world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

customize.name: Transient Resin
customize.desc:
An item that can be used to replenish Original Resin. Once used, it will replenish 60 Original Resin.

Once obtained, it will automatically dissipate after a period of time.

· The expiration time will be calculated from the Monday after this item is obtained, and it will disappear seven days from then.

· Multiple Transient Resins obtained on different weeks will have their expiration dates counted independently.

Pure energy that will dissipate with time. In this, it is similar to all else that is lovely in this world. But seize this opportunity and go make the world a slightly better place, as is fitting for one who dwells within the bounds of "time."

customize.text: Additional Rewards

<color=#ffffff>Requirement</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reward</color>
Accumulate 120 Dire Prestige

Additional Random 5-Star Artifact from chosen Domain of Blessing
Reward can be obtained multiple times
Accumulate 1,200 Dire Prestige

customize.name: Dust of Enlightenment
customize.desc:
The power of Artifacts stems from stories. Thus, sacred or profane writings may reshape them.
There is no good or evil inherent in stories. Songs and words may have the power to save as well as destroy, just as believed by the emissary who once conveyed revelations to the holiest of sovereigns, governed the nations on earth and their glory, yet eventually fell from the high heavens. To this day, whether pure or impure, these feathers can still inscribe false revelations and rewrite fated tales, yet the only outcome of defying the world is to scatter into dust.

customize.text: Reward can only be obtained once per event reset
Challenge Rewards
Challenge Rewards can be obtained every time Stygian Onslaught event updates after a new version release.

<color=#ffffff>Requirement</color>
<color=#ffffff>Rewards</color>
Complete the challenge on Normal or higher difficulty

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Radiant Phantasm: Incursion Repeller
customize.desc:
A special treasure obtained from breaking through the most perilous layer of the Ley Line disturbance. It is made of "information" in its purest form, coalesced into the shape of a lost weapon.
These weapons, forgotten by script and song alike, experienced a tragic battle alongside their original wielders in Teyvat's distant past...
And, as the pure information was stripped from the Ley Lines, they began to dissipate, until, after a time, they could scarcely maintain even their basic form...

customize.text: Complete the challenge on Dire difficulty in single-player mode within 180s

customize.name: Radiant Phantasm: Incursion Repeller - Sublimation
customize.desc:
A special treasure obtained from breaking through the most perilous layer of the Ley Line disturbance with unstoppable strength and force. It is made of "information" in its purest form, coalesced into the shape of a lost weapon.
These weapons, forgotten by script and song alike, experienced a tragic battle alongside their original wielders in Teyvat's distant past...
And, as the pure information was stripped from the Ley Lines, they began to dissipate, until, after a time, they could scarcely maintain even their basic form...

customize.text:
Stygian Onslaught is a permanent combat event that will begin 8 days after each update and will be available for 5 weeks per phase. During the event, there will be 6 difficulty levels available: Normal, Advancing, Hard, Menacing, Fearless and Dire. On each difficulty, players will face powerful foes on 3 separate battlefields.
Players can also compete in the challenge via the Co-Op Mode up to Menacing Difficulty and obtain rewards. Other players can also be invited in the party to take on Fearless V and Dire VI challenges.
Disturbance Outbreak will be available after the event begins and players who reached Adventure Rank 45 and cleared Hard Difficulty can participate in it in Single Player Mode or Co-Op Mode.
Eligibility

<color=#ffffff>Base Requirement</color>
Reach Adventure Rank 20
Complete Archon Quest "Song of the Dragon and Freedom"
<color=#ffffff>Best Experience</color>
Difficulty Levels

<color=#ffffff>Difficulty</color>
<color=#ffffff>Details</color>
<color=#ffffff>Normal Challenge: Normal</color>

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Criteria:</color> Automatically unlocked
<color=#ffffff>Co-Op Mode:</color> Available
Characters can be deployed multiple times.
<color=#ffffff>Normal Challenge: Advancing</color>

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Criteria:</color> Automatically unlocked
<color=#ffffff>Co-Op Mode:</color> Available
Characters can be deployed multiple times.
<color=#ffffff>Normal Challenge: Hard</color>

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Criteria:</color> Automatically unlocked
<color=#ffffff>Co-Op Mode:</color> Available
Characters can be deployed multiple times.
<color=#ffffff>Normal Challenge: Menacing</color>

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Criteria:</color> Clear previous difficulty within time limit
<color=#ffffff>Co-Op Mode:</color> Available
Characters cannot be be deployed multiple times.
<color=#ffffff>Normal Challenge: Fearless</color>

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Criteria:</color> Clear previous difficulty within time limit
<color=#ffffff>Co-Op Mode:</color> Available but rewards cannot be claimed
Characters cannot be be deployed multiple times.
Opponents are affected by the Ley Line Disturbance and are greatly enhanced.
<color=#ffacff>Perilous Challenge: Dire</color>

<color=#ffe14b>Perilous Objective: Complete the battle within 180s</color>
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Criteria:</color> Clear previous difficulty within time limit on Single Player Mode
<color=#ffffff>Co-Op Mode:</color> Available but rewards cannot be claimed
Characters cannot be be deployed multiple times.
<color=#ff9999>The level of disturbance is at its highest, interfering with even the Exalted Ones and rendering their Eminent Boons ineffective.</color>
Exalted Ones

The characters Travelers used to clear Dire Difficulty and complete the Perilous Objective will receive "Eminence" and "Enduring Eminence" respectively. A single character can only have either of these status and receiving "Enduring Eminence" will replace the existing "Eminence."
The 16 characters with the most Eminence on the server will become the new Exalted Ones and grant powerful combat boons to other Travelers. The initial list of Exalted Ones will be updated 2 hours at 12:00 PM (GMT+8) after Stygian Onslaught challenges unlock and the information will be regularly updated every day at 04:00 AM (GMT+8)
When other Travelers challenge Fearless Difficulty or below with Exalted Ones, the "Eminent Boon" will become active. These characters will have their <color=#ffe14b>Max HP, ATK and DEF increased by 20%</color> during the challenge.
Co-Op Mode

Players can invite teammates to take part in Co-Op challenges while in Co-Op Mode.
When multiple players enter the challenge, the opponents' combat power will change to that of the corresponding Co-Op difficulty, and will not continue to change based on the number of players participating in the challenge.
Co-Op challenge results will be recorded separately, and players can check these records at any time. However, only Single-Player Mode challenge records can be displayed to friends.
Battle Preparation

<color=#ffffff>Party Setup</color>
On the Party Setup Menu, Travelers can choose the characters for the 3 different Battlefields. Depending on the challenge difficulty, same character may or may not be allowed.
In the Single-Player Mode and up to Hard Difficulty in Co-Op Mode, players always adjust the party lineup before each battle in the Battle Preparation Interface.
<color=#ffffff73>However, from Menacing Difficulty onwards in Co-Op Mode, players will have to choose their characters after initiating the Co-Op challenge and after the leader begins the battle, all players won't be able to adjust their lineup, weapons and artifacts during the challenge.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>If players change their lineup for a specific enemy or weapons or artifacts for a character, only the battlefield specific to that enemy will be reset and players may override their record upon completion.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Domain of Blessing</color>
Before starting the challenge, players can select their preferred Domain of Blessings for rewards and the choice can be freely switched during the Disturbance Outbreak.
In Co-Op Mode, only the leader is allowed to choose the Domain of Blessing.
